TopicTitle: A small litle thing that would help me so much.

Articles.Content:
so i've been playing for a while and what really slows me down is that i have no idea of the liftforce gravity pull and such of my craft so a small litle thing like a total thrust, drag and wheight list would really help me a lot mayby make it toggleble like the current thrust lift and center of gravity.

Thank you /me

Kerbal Engineer does this. It's very helpful building craft and giving information during flight. The MechJeb autopilot also has information screens. VOID is great for in-flight information.

As far as the main game is concerned, the devs have been aiming for a minimalist interface so as not to scare away people who are just starting out, but we might see new information in future.

As far as I can tell, you want Kerbal Engineer Redux. It'll calculate and display more or less all the information you'll need, like Thrust/Weight, Delta-V, etc. Mechjeb will also do that, but I'd say get Kerbal Engineer instead, unless you want to use Mechjeb's other features like the autopilot.

More info on the ship is on the what not to suggest list (Show vehicle parameters such as weight, cost and delta V ) and will come as squad improve the editor.
